title: BluFX + HDR Environment X II for X-Plane 10
description:
This package content the X-Plane plugin BluFX, the source code and HDR Environment X II.

BluFX is a free plugin for the X-Plane 1o Simulator that add post-processing effects to X-Plane, like ENB or SweetFX for FSX but with a nice interface with many preset and slider for your own ajustment. When the BluFX settings panel is opened in X-Plane, the screen is split down in the middle to show you X-Plane Default on one side and BluFX Enhanced on the other. Everything is done in real-tine, and the best part, it work in GNU/Linux, Mac and Windows ;)

HDR Environment X II is a package that content alternative clouds, sky colors, lights and shaders to replace X-Plane 10 default. HDR Environment X II enhance the genral look of X-Plane 10 for free. The sky, the clouds and the lighting look way more real and natural with this nice addition to X-Plane 10 simulator.

Enjoy !
